artist: Engraver: Giuseppe Rosaspina; Painter: After Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri); Draftsman: Francesco Rosaspina
description: Virgin holding child seated on a cloud surrounded by angels and cherubs; below St. Bruno kneeling with bishop's mitre and staff at his knees; hooded figure kneeling left holding a cross; skull and crucifix at right
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [T. Barvieri detto Guercino dip.  F. Rosaspina dis.  G Rosaspina inc./S. BRUNO IN ORAZIONE]; on sheet in pencil: [1-508]
title: S. Bruno in Orazione
